item.title: WATCH: Washington, DC officials clear out homeless encampments
item.description: President Trump vowed this week to rid Washington, D.C. of homeless encampments, issuing a warning that the "homeless have to move out, IMMEDIATELY."

item.title: 2 easyJet planes clip wings at Manchester Airport in UK
item.description: Two easyJet planes clipped wings on the runway at Manchester International Airport in the United Kingdom on Friday morning, officials said.
